lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Its a small way to make a big difference in someones life.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children the power of giving.

lender.name: John and Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Help out in a small way.

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: Want to help those who are willing to work to make their dreams come true.

lender.name: Amtur-Rahman
lender.loan_because: ALLAH gives to me every second of every day masha'allah

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage hard work and independence.
lender.occupational_info: I create online learning courses for those who want to learn and access education by using the Internet.

lender.name: Stravina
lender.loan_because: Both my parents were entrepreneurs and worked very hard for all their children.I just want to see someone get the opportunity to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am attending college and i work part time.Taking care of elderly and disabled patients in their homes.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Want to help those who are eager to better themselves and are willing to work hard for their goal. Hoping to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I have the resources to help those who need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I work with farmers and their families to help them understand the financial side of their business so they can run their business better. My philosophy is "Creating happy families and a healthy business".

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I have recently been to West Africa, and realized how hard it is to make a living for oneself. I know that even the smallest donation or loan can make a world of difference.
lender.occupational_info: (I'm the girl on the left!). I have just finished my bachelors degree and am hoping to go on to medical school.

lender.name: Elise
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of other people, in a hospital setting.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I believe women are the force that will change the world for the better, so I feel privileged to help other women change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an author and playwright.

lender.name: Johnny
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an extended helping hand at one point or another. I've used more than my fair share of extended helping hands. It's time for me to extend my hands to those who need it.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: Even a small loan gives people a chance to make a difference in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I assess patients and provide care to meet their physiological and mental needs.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.occupation: Dance Studio Owner and Elementary Teacher
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I teach dance and school to children. I was given a scholarship to dance once, and it shaped my life and gave me faith!

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: It is so great to help other women succeed in business
lender.occupational_info: I won the International Scholarship for Women in Business and work for the State of Maryland. I am getting my Masters degree at night and feel it is important to give back.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people hope! And, I have faith in people.
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for a National non-profit organizational in the health industry.

lender.name: April Joy
lender.loan_because: I believe in redistributing wealth from North America to directly help develop other parts of the world

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: We should all help each other if you have the means!
lender.occupational_info: Sports and Athletics

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for and it is the least that I can do.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do...to lend a helping hand to those you can,

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to be an American and live in the land of plenty. Hopefully I can help someone move out of poverty into a better life.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference!

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of hard working people in this world who could be very successful if given the opportunity to start their venture.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math to children who are 12-14 years old.

lender.name: Rosalind
lender.loan_because: Giveing is a gift from GOD you can not go wrong it make you feel good to know that you made a diffent in some one else life. If i can help some body as i travel alone then my giving will not be in vain.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I believe that no matter who you are or what your own life's circumstances are, there is always something you can do to help others. Even in these tough economic times, there is always someone whose need is greater than my own. There is nothing that makes me feel more alive and worthy than to give. It is an honor to help those helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of two wonderful sons. They are the joys of my life! I have been a flight attendant for Delta Air Lines for 24 years and I also teach Pre-Kindergarten. My dream is to open my own 'green' school some day.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: having the ability and means to give is in itself a gift.
lender.occupational_info: I am the President of my own non-profit organization which funds education for females in Uganda

lender.name: jan & john
lender.loan_because: Kiva gives us an opportunity to share our many blessings with someone who needs a helping hand up! we do what we can to support people within our own community but lending with Kiva allows us to help those who have nowhere else to turn.
lender.occupational_info:
... jan is retired now from a real job and works at scrolling through the Kiva website and lurking on the forum at www.kivafriends.org. ... john drives a school bus every day and loves being with the children. ... we are both Christians trying to see the face of God where ever we turn and in whoever we meet. ... we are also "born straight but refuse to hate" so we fly the rainbow flag when opportunity arises.
Learn more about Fistulas - - ... watch the video From Despair To Dignity (5:08) www.yaninamanolova.com/fistula/index.html then please click once for me on this link... http://tinyurl.com/44vjutw ... to help me earn .08 Euros for the Fistula Hospital, thanks in advance.

lender.name: sylvester
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: n/a

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: In memory of my Mom and Dad.
lender.occupational_info: Nonprofit medical management.

lender.name: Dani
lender.loan_because: Because I love it !!
lender.occupational_info: I have to superviser health and safety of workers

lender.name: Ingrid & Andy
lender.loan_because: It feels fantastic to help others, watch them grow and blossom into successful entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I like to Help People, Help them self.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my kids how easy and how much joy it is to help other people anywhere in the world!

lender.name: gloria
lender.loan_because: I want to see others get ahead and have the opportunity to earn a good living with their own business
lender.occupational_info: Payroll and accounting functions

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I am not wealthy by any means, but I feel blessed with what I have. It makes me feel good to know I can help someone get by day to day and achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office for a company that sell interior contruction materials for new homes

lender.name: Kristy
lender.loan_because: I am moved by compassion.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage the sales and profits for a Grocery Store chain in the South East., US This includes, deciding what items to sell, how to price them, when and how to promote them. Basically, science, marketing and alot of favor.
I'm originally from the Caribbean and my dream is to create an avenue for those of us who have left and been succesful, to give back to the people and countries that raised us.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know I can help someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help solve business problems through technology.

lender.name: Mel
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others to succed in thier endeavors for a better life for them and thier families.
lender.occupational_info: Retired petroleum engineer

lender.name: Denis
lender.loan_because: I was born in El Salvador and I know how poverty affects people. I want to be able to help out.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: John & Fran
lender.loan_because: We give because we can.
lender.occupational_info: Extremely challenging, always changing, sometimes intense, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

lender.name: Robby
lender.loan_because: It's important to me to help others, especially individuals & groups that are focused on humanitarian type projects.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others how to grow & market their business.

lender.name: Althea
lender.loan_because: We all need help from time to time and I love the fact that there is a way that we can all truly be our brothers keeper. My heart is light knowing that they will have a chance when the was none before.
lender.occupational_info: I sell hot dogs form a mobile vending cart. would like to expand to a building one day and hire other people.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to have a single income and start a new business

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: Helping others in this small way is good soup for the soul. :-)

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe people prefer opportunity over charity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who specialize in different types of technology. The technology we use, and how we use it, helps the company we work for grow.

lender.name: Universal ComOne LA
lender.loan_because: Everyone who can help others should. We know the feeling wanting to start a business and no one is there to assist you financially.
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications Company - My company provides phones to businesses.

lender.name: Elizabeth & Hugh
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: We paint and sell decorative ceramic pieces.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I am so very fortunate in my life. I want to be able to pass that good fortune on to others.
lender.occupational_info: Fortunately, my job is universal. Being a mom doesn't need explanation. The main difference is that I am fortunate to be able to stay home and not have to work.

lender.name: Moira
lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.name: Mike and Deb
lender.loan_because: The future of our world depends on global understanding and cooperation. We want to reach out to give people of the world an opportunity to make a future for themselves.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: Assist individuals and small businesses get from where they are to where they want to be!

lender.name: Lena
lender.loan_because: I recently traced my DNA to Sierra Leone and would like to contribute to my African family. I want to be able to help make a difference in someone life.

lender.name: Rev. Terry
lender.loan_because: The world has become a smaller place thanks to the World Wide Web. I loan to help my neighbor. I loan to help my sisters and borthers.
lender.occupational_info: I play a few roles; teach in a college, minister & serve others through my Interfaith training, offer support as a counselor, and encourage healing through energy work.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I understand it takes a little help sometimes to be successful and I want entrepreneurs to be successful.

lender.name: Payal
lender.loan_because: Hopefully I can make a difference in someone's life for the better and they in turn can can help someone else....the chain will make the world a better more caring place...

lender.name: Leigh and Daniel
lender.occupation: Stay at home Mom and Student

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: it is the least I can do.

lender.name: AJM
lender.loan_because: Started my own business with a small loan. This is one way to pass along the same chance I got.
lender.occupational_info: Clean Homes

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: I feel I should.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank whose mission statement is to help individuals and institutions prosper. I'm a professional lender.

lender.name: Cherae
lender.loan_because: I hope I never have so little that I feel I'm unable to share with another who's less fortunate. Just think of what a wonderful world this would be if everyone gave someone else a little help when they need it. So little to us can mean so very much to someone else. To be of service is the greatest gift!

lender.name: Frederick
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good knowing that I am giving someone a chance. We have all been given a chance at some point in life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a private pharmacy.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people acheive their goals and make their dreams come true - for me that is the ultimate gift to give.
lender.occupational_info: I co-ordinate advertising for a national retail company. I make sure that the production schedules are met for flyers and ads.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: Incredibly seflish motivations - it feels good to help someone else!! I hope that the small amount I have to share will make a difference for someone!
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a social service program working with children who have emotional disturbances.

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I have the possibility to do so. As a student with not a lot of extra cash at hands, giving out loans is an excellent way of doing a little bit for those less fortunate.

lender.name: Mitzie
lender.loan_because: I have much to be thankful for and I'd like to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I'm now retired. I worked as therapist or counselor to those with mental health and substance abuse problems

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It gives me an opportunity to help someone who wants to improve their situation but is unable without help. Helping others is makes you feel wonderful inside.

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart smile.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I think we all have a humanitarian responsibility to help others in need. It all starts with a vision...

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I believe every one deserves the right to develop pride in themselves and to be able to break the chains of poverty that bind them.
lender.occupational_info: I own a clothing shop. I have worked very hard and have been blessed with the rewards of being able to provide for my family.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: this is a really cool thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I direct an eco-theology project and I am learning to write novels.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I saw this on Oprah and loved the idea of it.
lender.occupational_info: I work monitoring, analyzing, and forecasting the program budgets for the state department of aging and disability services in Texas.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: these people need a hand up, not a hand out. There is no reason not to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lender.name: Sarita
lender.loan_because: It should be our duty in this world to help those less fourtunate than us and to encourage them to reach their full potential.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: To give someone else an opportunity to pursue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: teaching and education in the Canadian Military

lender.name: Matty
lender.loan_because: I feel to help even if it is a grain of sand. for each grain counts to build gteat dunes
lender.occupational_info: straight commission ,what I enjoy helping people

lender.name: StewY
lender.loan_because: Like helping other people!!!
lender.occupational_info: Make engine parts for Honda Motors...

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I loan for the reason that many people do. It makes me happy to help someone create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work as security staff in a municipal building.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I am THRILLED to have found out about this organization today, 11/22/07. It was truly by providence that I happened to turn on Oprah today and found myself glued to all the wonderful information. This site is now in my favs and I will continue to help in any way I can. BRAVO KIVA!! I've even posted the info on my blog space and will be sending out emails as well. It is most important to realize that even one "lender" stay involved. After all, we are all linked in this world. I, myself, am now retired, and even though I have to budget, Kiva is part of that. I think it's very important to give back to others, even if it's only small amounts that can be done at a time. In my mind, this is a way to link all cultures and people in real unity. It's true caring from the heart.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed with many things in life and want to give back. I do much volunteer work locally but want to do something on a bigger scale.
lender.occupational_info: Legal

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I like to help women progress.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe that a helping hand is greater than a handout.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I get a rush out of watching meager turn into MASSIVE!
lender.occupational_info: Primary Job: Momma Secondary Job: ESL Teacher

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: It is such an appropriate thing to do - and I am grateful for the chance to make a difference with even a small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: Much of my time is devoted to fund raising for breast cancer research. I know we must all be a part of the solution. There are many problems to solve.

lender.name: Sharon Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe all people should have a chance to improve their way of life and help others at the same time. If starting a business is what you feel called to do, you should be able to get money at a reasonable cost.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm mainly an RN which means that I am a registered nurse who helps people to get better. I work mainly with the elderly to make sure they get quality care at this time of their life.
I am, also, a very proud Oma(which means grandma in German) to Caitlyn Jane who is now 24 months old but was about 7 months old in this picture of me, my husband and Caitlyn Jane.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I am a fortunate person and would love to pass on some of that benefit to others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of birthing mothers as a midwife/nurse

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with many opportunities starting with a good education. I loan because it may help someone else with their opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I have several initiatives underway including a new aquatic products website. I also raise paint horses.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: When I was just getting started I was very blessed by kind gestures from a few people and now it is my turn to give back and help another person achieve his or her dream!
lender.occupational_info: I am very fortunate to do something I love and therefore it never really seems like work. I create comfortable and attractive environments for people to live in.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference in other's lives, no matter where they live or how small the contribution.

lender.name: Bro. Matthias
lender.loan_because: To try to make life a little easier for people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Benedictine monk.

lender.name: Tomas
lender.loan_because: I dont main to help but i nede first to be help to in troduce my product to the market and dear i can help oters.
lender.occupational_info: Les avantages du projet (M.P.S.) Infinito pourraient bien servir pour chauffer et alimenter les maisons unifamiliales ou semi-d√©tach√©es, aux chalets et aux maisons de campagne, et plus incroyable encore, √† l‚Äôautomobile de l‚Äôavenir qui ne consumerait ni gasoline ou Diesel ou Ethanol, mais qui fonctionnerait √† l‚Äô√©nergie produite de l‚Äôeau, de l‚Äôanti-gel et de l‚Äôhuile min√©rale.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: This was a gift certificate and some-thing that I had never heard of. It is a wonderful opportunity for both lender and receiver to work towards the same goal .
lender.occupational_info: I work in a medium security men's prison, specifically in the counseling department. My job is to ensure that offenders receive services to assist them in their rehabilitation back into society. This requires supervision of counselors and their daily duties.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Web nerd

lender.name: Randall and Kathryn
lender.loan_because: My niece, Rachel, wanted to support instead of receiving a Christmas gift for herself.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky to live in a country like Canada. Such a small amount can make such an impact on someone's life.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: You have to give to the universe in order to receive!

lender.name: mickey
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help because my Mother was a giver and she is no longer with us. I wanted to carry on her tradition.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a classroom with a teacher. I provide support and assistance to children who need extra help, academically and emotionally.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity to have a better life and pass on the luck I have had in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for companies and individuals.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.occupational_info: I fix things with technology that people use everyday, to help make their life just that little bit easier.

lender.name: Zoila
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I want the creative potential of the modern day visionary to be released in a way which promotes, healthy and positive ways of thinking and service to the community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, a coach, a business man, an entrepreneur and a creator.

lender.name: LINDA
lender.occupation: CUSTOMER SERVICE FOR A MAJOR CREDIT CARD COMPANY

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful concept that lets everyone contribute and help improve the lives of others around the world!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Analyst

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so many wonderful opportunities in my life, I feel it is only right that I help someone else better their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher.

lender.name: Emerson
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone's life be better.

lender.name: Cindie
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve someones life.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: of Oprah!!!

lender.name: Torsten
lender.loan_because: We want to help entrepreneurs developing countries follow their dream and make a better living for themselves and their communities
lender.occupational_info: I work with large corporations to help them solve their toughest problems

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: rayanne
lender.loan_because: These people need the money so much more than I do. They work so hard to provide for their families and deserve a break, no matter how small. Many have several children and have to pay for their children's education. I applaud them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the library of a high school in the U.S. These students receive a free education, yet so many of them do not appreciate it. Students in many other countries have to pay for their education, and they appreciate it so much. We are a selfish nation, unfortunately, and I feel fortunate to help someone in another country who appreciates every single thing they receive. I wish the young people in the U.S. could see out of your eyes. Thank you!

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me over the years, it now time for me to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: It gives me great pleasure to provide great service to others. I have a very rewarding Job.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I like helping people less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I take phone calls from professional people who need help fixing there computer and printer.

lender.name: Magda M, Chuck.
lender.loan_because: we love to help people,who try to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and i are retired from the med field. our love is for making the world a better place.we rescued 5 huskies.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I loan money because it's a gift to me to be able to be in this position that allows me to give back. Everytime I click the button to lend, I know it's for someone that appreciates the loan.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small company as an assistant.

lender.name: R.A.K.E.
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people- it's that simple. Someone helped me once- you have to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve life for those who need it.

lender.name: Adriana
lender.loan_because: It's the least I can do. I often spend money on things I don't need, so I love it that I can do my little part to help hard working people across the world that need a little help.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: a little money can make such a big difference in the lives of families around the world
lender.occupational_info: direct the activities of an international organization in Pakistan working to help people in political parties create more democratic, representative and accountable organizations

lender.name: Wanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of empowering an entrepreneur to fulfill his/her dreams of being self-sufficient and successful.
lender.occupational_info: I write part-time and have a sales career. I have self-published 11 gift books and my own entrepreneurial dream is to become a full-time writer, traveling the world and inciting compassion and passion. I have recently launched a new travel memoir called, The Cuban Chronicles, A True Tale of Rascals, Rogues, and Romance.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: A little help is sometimes all that's needed to change a destiny.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate in life and we all should share in our good fortune. A valuable lesson taught to me by my parents.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a government agency and help families and children in crisis.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Paule
lender.loan_because: It's a way to give back and help people who are doing something to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I design and manufacture cabinetry and furniture

lender.name: Franco
lender.loan_because: I want to help in providing an opportunity for others to succeed.

lender.name: Lori
lender.occupation: Teacher, Writer, Public Speaker & World Traveler
lender.loan_because: All people deserve to flourish and thrive in self-expression in whatever work they choose to do. I support people who have self-leadership to make a difference in life for themselves and their families, and to model this for others to understand they can do the same. I especially support women who rise high above poverty and make a difference in their community and country.
lender.occupational_info: I am a woman who empowers others to take inspired action in their own life, in their community, in their country, and in other countries around the world so that everyone lives with higher energy.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: of the needs of so many. It is so small but can have so much worth. Empowering people is KEY!
lender.occupational_info: I work with the healing properities of the body to help people end pain and embrace a life of joy passion and purpose.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I care, and because investing just a little can help people who are trying so hard to help themselves and their families. That is a very good investment!
lender.occupational_info: My company creates products are improving the lives of countless children and adults by training brain function at its core.

lender.name: Tanya & Richard
lender.loan_because: Collectivity, what a concept! great idea, guys.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a wonderful Canadian retailer of women apparel in Montreal. I am in charge of buying the contemporary product we sell in our 135 stores across Canada and the internet.

lender.name: Malea
lender.loan_because: I would love to make someones life better, by giving a loan. ; )

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women to own their own business and be indepedent.

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to try to make a start in this world. I give to Kiva so that I can help other people start a successful career for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I care for the needs of children from other families. I am also responsible for light housework. I love my job because I get to be a part of the development of our worlds next generation. caring for children is very rewarding.

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: I want others to feel of God's love for them.

lender.name: Pamela Capati
lender.loan_because:
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." -Winston Churchill
"Anticipate charity by preventing poverty; assist the reduced fellow man, either by a considerable gift or a sum of money or by teaching him a trade or by putting him in the way of business so that he may earn an honest livelihood and not be forced to the dreadful alternative of holding out his hand for charity. This is the highest step and summit of charity's golden ladder." -Maimonides

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel that everyone needs to feel empowered and deserves oppurtunity!
lender.occupational_info: I am blessed to be in a profession where i am able to help others as I am a nurse. I love to share this with others and try to give back when there is a need!

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I can. It's that simple.

lender.name: Susan Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want my Grandson Aiden's world to be a kinder place to live.We must help whenever we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist at heart but am currently running my own retail business selling used furniture.My grandson is 6 years old and helps us out by greeting customers and cleaning windows and counters.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jo-Anne
lender.loan_because: I think empowering people to change their own life is the most rewarding gift

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info: i work full time for an insurance company. my dream is to be able to devote my time to creating meaningful change and beauty.

lender.name: Kim
lender.whereabouts: Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. Canada Ontario

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's not about how much you have but rather it's all about how well you use it.
lender.occupational_info: My main focus is helping others make wise choices with their money in order to acheive their dreams be they big or small. We work together to develop a plan that is both comfortable and empowering and proiritizes their personal values.

lender.name: marie
lender.loan_because: when I needed a loan I couldn't get one, so I know how it feels to be denied and not have resources.
lender.occupational_info: I care for people who need care. The elderly and children.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference and because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer and and Estimator for a Disaster Restoration company.

lender.name: Dr. Paul Burns
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to this program by former President Clinton who I admire greatly (he was the coolest President) when he was interviewed on TV by Larry King Show.
lender.occupational_info: I was a type of Doctor that helped many people suffering form many forms of pain by adjusting and manipulating the spine and joints of the body with my hands.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people get on with their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I sell photos and stories.

lender.name: Dee & George
lender.occupation: retired teacher and retired police officer
lender.loan_because: We have had the opportunity to travel to underdeveloped countries in Africa and Indonesia to build schools, playgrounds and develop educational materials. We have made many lifelong friends from these countries that are honest, hardworking and loving people who only need a "hand up". We believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: Dee was a teacher with special needs students and a counsellor. George was an R.C.M.P. officer

lender.name: naomi
lender.loan_because: I couldn't think of a better way of spending an extra $25 dollars. Something like this would probably be just a couple of trips to a local Starbucks, but to these people its everything. The way they survive...It means much more to them than any coffee could ever mean to me, and that makes me feel so awesome!!
lender.occupational_info: I have a part time job working at UPS...but my most important job is being a mother to my four children :) I have 2 boys and 2 girls and they are my life. I would do anything for them.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: It's a way of helping someone across the world and maybe making their life a little easier. Helping someone can create a chain reaction. Every person who is given a little help in reaching their goals can be a role model and inspiration to others--how can that be bad?
lender.occupational_info: I work as a page at the library, surrounded by books, it's great! I am also a student, interested in creative writing and poetry.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: When you have a grateful spirit, you want to be able to give to others - empower them and let them have blessings. We all are ONE.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: someone helped me start my business and it changed my life and I would love to provide an opportunity for someone to change other people's lives as well.
lender.occupational_info: I make films and television shows.

lender.name: Solange
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I counsel people using my spiritual gifts to help them to better understand things and to help them heal. I also teach others spiritual practices, so that they can enhance their own abilities. I also teach Tai Chi, a moving meditation for longevity and a healthy body with which to enjoy it.

lender.name: Simeon
lender.loan_because:
I have been bless with so much.
Sharing my good fortune ( financially, spiritually, or intellectually) is a way to give back to those that have helped me throughout my life.
lender.occupational_info: I make an effort to enable children to see their paths and help them make a decision about which to follow.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: it can transform a person's life and in turn a nation and a world.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: We all belong to each other

lender.name: dorota
lender.loan_because: i was inspired by Ophra show, and i would like to help.
lender.occupational_info: i work as a cashier in a big market,

lender.name: Mary Kaye
lender.loan_because: everyone has the right to a good life.
lender.occupational_info: Positive and cheerful. Likes to cook

lender.name: The Mundell Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and teach our children to do the same.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I want other people to be as fortunate as the Lord has blessed me.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients with claims they present to our Insurance company The Dominion General Insurance Company of Canada

lender.name: Saundra
lender.loan_because: Favorite Quote may explain: "People who say it can not be done should not interrupt those of us who are doing it" Unknown
lender.occupational_info: I work for two independently owned newspapers in the Oklahoma City Metro Area. The Oklahoma Gazette is a weekly news, arts and entertainment newspaper and It was established in 1979. We also have a business to business monthly magazine called OKCBiz. Our Parent Company is called Tierra Media Group. Check out our websites www.okgazette.com & www.okcbusiness.com

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: Everybody should do their part to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the medical field and see patients in the same way a medical doctor does.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: it takes a village. I am part of the village.
lender.occupational_info: I run a non profit mentoring agency which serves children.

lender.name: Karen & Bonnie
lender.loan_because: Giving makes us feel good. We are blessed, we work hard and to share with other dedicated people is a gift to our spirit.
lender.occupational_info: We've owned our business for many years. I try to help the physically challenged improve their quality of life. Bonnie keeps the business loose ends tied up and masterminds the computer system.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: We want our 3 sons to learn about giving and helping others! We think it is wonderful to help others that are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my 3 sons ages 8,6,and 3 and my husband. My husband is a construction worker. I have a wonderful family!!!

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I research endangered ecosystems and try to restore them to their natural state

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I wish to give to give to folks who are working to better their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small animals. I do preventative care, and medical and surgical care.

lender.name: Lanny
lender.loan_because: I care about others.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: The daily news really gets me down at the level of dispair around the world. I'm thrilled that I can make an impact in the world by helping others that are motivated to work hard to improve their life and the lives of their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a global project director running clinical trials all over the world.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: I love the opportunity to help entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make money with their websites.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I am a benevolent soul.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital for children.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: HELPING OTHERS IS WHAT GIVES LIFE PURPOSE. NOTHING IS MORE IMPORTANT THAN CONTRIBUTING WITH NO EXPECTATION OF A RETURN.
lender.occupational_info: MY MISSION IN LIFE IS TO HELP OTHERS HELP THEMSELVES

lender.name: Dana&Mark
lender.loan_because: We wanted to give back, having traveled to many countries and been given so much.
lender.occupational_info: Having started a graphic design/advertising company ten years ago from scratch, we know the challenges and rewards of entrepreneurship.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: One World One People.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: It is easy, fun, and I know it is going to a good place. And even if I don't get the money back, I still would be helping someone out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, so I don't really work. My dad works so I can go to school. I am working towards a degree in school psychology

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be able to touch the lives of people in need. When people unite and give a little we can do great things to help others. AND It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Rachael & Michal
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the gift of opportunity :)

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I feel good about helping out others who are less fortunate that I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing vice president of a non-alcoholic beverage company.

lender.name: Kris and Iris
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to fight poverty.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to help someone improve his or her life.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: it enriches the lives of others.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others through faith.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian who runs a small business in the United States and pray that my contributions will help people around the world feel appreciated and trusted. One small act of random kindness is a great beggining.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: Developing local economies is the only way to ensure the future stability of the global economy.
lender.occupational_info: I study history, politics, and literature at a large university in the midwest.

lender.name: Elle
lender.loan_because: As a Returned Peace Corps Volunteer I see the Kiva loan as one of the most efficient ways to participate in the process of elevating the quality of life for individuals in need while ensuring a certain level of sustainability. Giving is an easy process. I can only hope that by this act I am able to provide some wonderful people with a new sense of self-reliance.

lender.name: dolly
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do....
lender.occupational_info: service....

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I deliver babies and take care of women in the office and the hospital.

lender.name: Bill McCready
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I trade futures (commodities) and I teach people all over the world how to make money trading futures.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Realtor in Atlanta, Georgia helping my clients to find the perfect place to call home.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: I love to help people in need and watch them prosper. This is such a great opportunity. God Bless You

lender.name: Marlon
lender.loan_because: Life is all about giving. Remember Jesus gave his life for us all.
lender.occupational_info: Guide airplanes in the sky. Prevent them from hitting each other. Provide safe, orderly and expeditious flow of air traffic.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: there is a need and I have the ability - fairly simple I think.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to get and maintain work.

lender.name: Lionel
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the right thing to do to help people getting out or poverty in a sustainable way.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing and sell of prepared food

lender.name: sophie & renee
lender.loan_because: It is a fantastic way to really help someone who genuinely needs a hand, support to get a venture going that will improve their lives and their families lives.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my upbringing & life - I am pleased that I have the opportunity to be able to assist others with their needs and dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach nursing at a local University.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: As Audrey Hepburn once said, "Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm; as you get older, remember you have another hand: The first is to help yourself, the second is to help others."

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and they don't. They try so hard and so I must help.

lender.name: todd
lender.loan_because: it seems the best way to change the world
lender.occupational_info: i go to high school and then i bus tables at a chain restaurant.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I love helping people in my community,to help them help themselves
lender.occupational_info: My job can be hard at times, but I love what I do cause the people I work with can no longer do day to day things by themselves anymore

lender.name: Anju
lender.loan_because: I want every soul to have HOPE .... and believe there is a chance to change your life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a software company in Healthcare - with a goal to help healthcare professionals provide the best possible service to their patients.

lender.name: Angelique
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.

lender.name: anne
lender.loan_because: I have received so much in my life - It is my duty to try to give back & help wherever I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make comfort blankets- one of a kind baby blankets for grown ups & for those in need of comfort. I also work full time in a dentist office- Dental schedueler extrordianire.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I think everyone needs a chance to improve their lives. It is something I had people to do for me when I was raising 3 boys by myself.
lender.occupational_info: I calibrate eye examining instruments.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It makes more sense than going to the mall and spending money on stupid stuff!!!
lender.occupational_info: I am an instructional coach in a public school.

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: a little money is worth a lot more when it's in the hands of someone who can really use it.

lender.name: Charly
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of hand up instead of hand out - it allows people to retain dignity and succeed in their own way.

lender.name: Jeannine
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people make their dream of a business a sucess!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe in the free enterprise system and believe everybody deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher of Entrepreneurship, Marketing, Retail, Promotions and Speech at the College and University level.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: I want to give back for all I have received.

lender.name: The Kulenkamp Family
lender.loan_because: We understand that we are blessed in so many ways and would like to extend our blessings to others in need. We would love to see an end to world poverty and a better world for all peoples.
lender.occupational_info: Bonnie is a teacher of 12-14 year old special needs students. Kyle works as a mutual funds representative at a business in Indianapolis.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I make t-shirts and printed canvas bags.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and I get like to help other people in need. A little help can go a long way for some people and it can change their life for the good forever.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of insurance salepeople.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. And selfishly speaking, it's a great karmic investment.
lender.occupational_info: I help people locate the most appropriate entity that may be able to assist them. On weekends, I jump out of airplanes.

lender.name: debra
lender.loan_because: small business loans can change people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: The Chamber's motto is "leading business..leading communities". We mentor and provide networking/affinity programs (disounts) to local business.

lender.name: Conny
lender.loan_because: I love to give back. Giving is the missing link that opens my heart and gives me peace of mind. I want to do so much more!
lender.occupational_info: I do a little of everything. I'm a non-denominational minister and I love performing weddings. I'm also a personal coach with products that I sell on-line. I've dabbled in radio, and I'm writing my first book.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: I want everyone in the world to get the same opportunities as the more fortunate of us.
lender.occupational_info: I try my best to help and my work is something I am very proud of.

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because:
It's fun to support others and be able to be an added value for others !
My heart is beating for my guests and hospitality and I strongly believe that hotels, restaurants, pubs and tourism are an essential part of a modern and happy society. Therefore I'm glad to be able to support this sector all over the world.
My focus lies on female entrepreneurs with restaurant or catering in South America who'd like to invest in 'hardware'
lender.occupational_info: Freelance waiter

lender.name: Abigail VonKitty
lender.loan_because: I gots tuna to spare,
lender.occupational_info: I am a cat that catches and eats vermin. I protect my human keeper.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deservers a chance to live with dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Provide internet service

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of a hand up!

lender.name: jane
lender.loan_because: I believe we all should help others escape poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a kindergarten teacher.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to own my own business and I did well with it. People helped me along the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired but late in life I learned to paint pictures. I now teach children how to paint which gives me great pleasure.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I want to. And I have the means to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a retail store that sells skincare and cosmetics. I am also a student studying Spanish and History, hoping to become an English teacher in Latin America, and then coming back to Canada to teach here.

lender.name: Olina
lender.loan_because: Being part of a family that is from a poor country myself I know how it feels. I was born in the United States but i do have sisters that are still in Haiti and I do understand how it can be. Loaning out money to a person that can make a difference,will make a differnece to this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor. Some one that is on Television. I have not done anything that will make you know me. But I also own my own business selling clothes.

lender.name: Ruth Anne
lender.loan_because: always wanted something honest and to do something that will make a difference
lender.occupational_info: housewife

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone better their life, who might otherwise not be able too.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school at the moment

lender.name: Nanda
lender.loan_because: I have gone through difficult times myself
lender.occupational_info: I love music and I love teaching

lender.name: luis
lender.loan_because: i want this because i wuold like to have my oun house i solicitate to you 1000 dolars 500 for buld the house and the other 500 for construccion material
lender.occupational_info: my work is taking care two persons cook and clean the house

lender.name: Carole & Shane
lender.loan_because: Watched Bill Clinton on Oprah and felt the need to help. If we a do a little we can make a big difference in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Carole is a Administrative Manager for a Non-Proft. Shane is a full time student at Pepperdine University and a member on the Pepperdine Golf Team.

lender.name: Life Assistance
lender.loan_because: As Executive Director of Life Assistance Foundation, my foundation to assist those in need, I am very blessed by God and have the ability to give.
lender.occupational_info: I also own my own business buying and selling real estate (land). I started the non-profit to give my blessings away to the youth, women and men that are homeless, abused or otherwise struggling with this life.

lender.name: Elli
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Allison
lender.occupational_info: I help deliver babies in the hospital. I take care of the new moms and babies.

lender.name: Janice
lender.occupation: Special Education Teacher and College Instructor
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world - the same reason I became a teacher.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children K - 5th grades who have learning problems. I also teach college students who are becoming teachers.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I want to support people working to make their lives better. It's a way I can say thanks to the people in my life who have helped me.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: There was a time when I was so poor that I could not have survived without the compassion, kindness and support of others who helped me through that rough patch of my life. Now it's my turn to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: Illness forced me to retire several years ago. Now I'm enjoying life with my husband and grandchildren. My passion is rippling light into the world in whatever little ways possible.

lender.name: Harmony
lender.loan_because: I want to help people. I don't think I should live extravagant when other people are struggling.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and I am in the military.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am excited to see people given the opportunity to succeed! Given the repayment rate, I know that you have been selected both because you have a personal commitment to succeed and because you have a good plan. Good luck!!!
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in many fields including education, real estate, electronic repair, restaurants (cooking and serving), computer programming and am currently doing retail sales (as is my wife Sue).

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe small acts of kindness can create a world of difference for others; which in turn, will help create a better world for everyone. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an educator, who works with children.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to help others do great things!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: My mother taught me and leads by example, that it is the right thing to do. When you have what you need, give so that others can have what they need.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Angela
lender.occupational_info: I am a Teller at a Bank in Canada.

lender.name: Cornelius Family
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference - this is one way.

lender.name: MARTHA
lender.loan_because: I feel that the people featured here on Kiva are really trying to better themselves and I'm happy to play a small role in their success. It makes me feel really good to be helping someone out.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: micro-lending is a way to help people in distant towns and villages, hopefully help them change their lives for the better
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve health care for First Nations people in Canada

lender.name: Meg and Dean
lender.occupation: Church Pastor and Media Relations Director
lender.loan_because: We loan to share our blessings and to spread the goodness of God.
lender.occupational_info: Meg is a church minister in the United Church of Christ. Dean works for an athletics department of a university.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: Its another way I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I explore for Uranium in Canada.

lender.name: Cheristy
lender.loan_because: Because one person can make a difference

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It certainly makes a difference and helps others to improve their lives. I feel honored to be able to give as much as possible...
lender.occupational_info: I'm a single father to two adopted sons...they are my world!

lender.name: Don and Kathy
lender.loan_because: I feel that the small business person is the foundation of any society. They were the backbone of the American dream.
lender.occupational_info: Along with being a former volunteer Commissioner of Public Housing for San Diego County I work as the president of a tenants association in a senior apartment building. Retired people should give back as much as they can to their community.

lender.name: Sam
lender.occupation: Service Coordinator for a social services agency
lender.loan_because: I believe in world citizenship and global connectivity, that changing the world should start in your own backyard and extend to the other side of the globe. I know that, living in the US, I take for granted a lot of opportunities that are not available to people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have developmental and physical disabilities. I support them in developing important life skills and accessing the services and supports then need to lead a successful and independent life.

lender.name: albert
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good, I am a father who is trying to show my young and beautiful daughter that we have the abilitly to help others and we should always look to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the great company of toyota, building cars and sending out parts to dealerships.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to know that I'm really helping someone fulfill their dream, goal or something important to them because they do not have the bevy of resources that we have in developed countries. Many of us do not take advantage of all that we can, yet I am proud of someone in a poor country taking the chance to rise above their circumstances to make life better for themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I care for the elderly and infirm.

lender.name: Nana
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of children and adults.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: I like making a difference and I love the personal stories!

lender.name: Rose & John
lender.loan_because: We are inspired by the initiative of these entrepreneurs and want to support them in whatever small way we can.
lender.occupational_info: John is a retired businessman. Rose was a family therapist. Currently we enjoy our family and traveling.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: We all need a helping hand every now and then...
lender.occupational_info: Fun, challenging and rewarding...

lender.name: cristina
lender.loan_because: I have never had an issue with giving a so called "handout" ,but Kiva turns that into a hand up. I have needed that in my life and been fortunate enough to have family who helped me, so this is the least that I can do. Pay it forward baby, pay it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I cut, color & style hair, pretty much a universal trade.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I am excited to see people empowered by just a bit of help from the outside... but I know to get a loan they have had to work hard to get where they are now!! I am glad to help hardworking friends! They are an inspiration to others!
lender.occupational_info: I live in the Philippines helping friends with livelihood projects and small businesses

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: it is an effective way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help people start and grow their businesses.

lender.name: Heidi Kai
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, trying to find my way in the world.

lender.name: Joannie
lender.loan_because: This organization is a great opportunity and I'm hoping to be able to help improve someone's life even just a little. It makes me happy to be a part of Kiva. I also sponsor through World Vision and Women for Women International.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom of a wonderful little boy, and I'm also an artist. I enjoy making jewellery, paper crafts, paintings on canvas, and more. I sell my jewellery creations on Etsy.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: We hope to help these people because we always have food on the table and a lot of people don't.
lender.occupational_info: We work in a local hospital and for the local doctors.

lender.name: joseph
lender.loan_because: I DO WHAT I HAVE TO DO NOW, SO I CAN DO WHAT I WANT TO DO LATER.
lender.occupational_info: Retail sales.
